00017 import tkinter, collections, functools, os
00018 from ..callbacks import project
00019 from xml.dom import minidom
00020 from PIL import Image, ImageTk
00021 
00022 class LeftToolbox(tkinter.Frame):
00023     def __init__(self, master, xmlfile, iconspath):
00024         tkinter.Frame.__init__(self, master=master)
00025 
00026         self["relief"]=tkinter.RAISED
00027         self["borderwidth"]=1
00028         self.master=master
00029 
00030         self.xmlfile=xmlfile
00031         self.iconspath=iconspath
00032 
00033         self.img=[]
00034 
00035         self.ToolboxTree=[]
00036         self.ToolboxWidgets=[]
00037         self.createToolboxTree()
00038         self.createToolbox()
00039 
00040     def createToolboxTree(self):
00041         xmltoolbox=minidom.parse(self.xmlfile)
00042         xmltoolboxRoot=xmltoolbox.firstChild
00043         for i in xmltoolboxRoot.childNodes:
00044             if (i.nodeName != "#text") and (i.nodeName !='#comment'):
00045                 self.ToolboxTree.append((i.attributes["icon"].value,
00046                                          i.attributes["callback"].value))
00047 
00048     def createToolbox(self):
00049         for i in self.ToolboxTree:
00050             self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, i[0]))))
00051             self.ToolboxWidgets.append(tkinter.Button(self,
00052                                                       command=functools.partial(eval(i[1]), self.master),
00053                                                       image=self.img[-1]))
00054             self.ToolboxWidgets[-1].pack(side="left")
